page.title: 05 My Day (4)
page.content:
1.45 pm At 1.45 we went in for afternoon school. We had the register and went to our next lesson. It was games. In games I played rounders. Rounders is where you are in a team. You have a bat and someone throws a ball and you have to hit it. You run to a base. There are four bases. If you think you can run around all of them you do. That is called a{ {rounder. }You can only get a rounder if you hit the ball hard and far. My team lost. We only got two rounders and the other team got six.
3.10 pm After games there were{House {Meetings. }In House Meetings we sorted out the teams for Sports Day. I am in RED House.
